title: How to change the cursor?
body: Hey guys, just wondering how I can change my cursor as it is sometimes hard to see in teamfights. I see some pro players have the same normal cursor but it turns silver when it clicks. Can anyone help me to change it to that? Thanks

replies.body: You just have to get used to it or maybe you can search some Videos up about how to change your in game league of legends crusor. However, I do not recommend doing it because sometimes changing the files inside the riot's folder can trigger a scan system or some crap like that and the system would interpret that file change as a third party program thus causing a ban. I know some people who got banned just cause they changed their HUD skin folder.
TL;DR You can get banned for everything, just don't do anything and you most likely probably won't get banned.
i think that colourization comes from the streaming program, and the player actually doesn't see it
